options.systemMessage: You are a data analyst. Analyze student progress scores over the last 7 days and determine if there is a declining trend for 3 or more consecutive days. Return structured JSON with declining (boolean), days (number), and reason (string).

assignments.name: alertMessage
assignments.value: ={{ 'ALERT: Student ' + $json.studentID + ' showing declining progress for ' + $json.days + ' days. Reason: ' + $json.reason }}

assignments.name: reminderMessage
assignments.value: ={{ 'Assalamu Alaikum! Monthly fee reminder for ' + $('Loop Over Students').item.json.currentMonth + '. Amount: Rs. ' + $('Loop Over Students').item.json.feeAmount + '. Due date: ' + $('Loop Over Students').item.json.dueDate + '. Student: ' + $('Loop Over Students').item.json.studentID }}

parameters.subject: ID Card/Admission Confirmation
parameters.message:
=Please refer to the information below and confirm the detais; {{ $json.studentName }}
S/O {{ $json.guardianName }}
Phone; {{ $json.phoneNumber }}
ID {{ $json.data }}
Admission Date {{ $json['Admission Date'] }}

parameters.subject: =Attendance Reminder – {{ $now.format("yyyy-MM-dd") }}
parameters.message: Assalamu Alaikum {{ $json.Name }},  Our records show that your attendance for today (Fajr, Zuhr, Maghrib) has not been marked.  If this is a mistake, please inform us. Otherwise, kindly ensure regular attendance.  JazakAllah khair.

parameters.subject: =Fee Remainder  {{ $('Workflow Configuration - Finance').item.json.currentMonth }}
parameters.message:
=It is to be informed that your fee dues for {{ $('Workflow Configuration - Finance').item.json.dueDate }} is not cleared for your ward
{{ $('Read Active Students1').item.json.studentName }}
{{ $('Read Active Students1').item.json.guardianName }}
Regards
Admin Jamia

parameters.subject: ={{ 'Exam Results - ' + $('Calculate Total and Grade').item.json.examName }}
parameters.html:
={{ '

Exam Results

Student ID: ' + $('Calculate Total and Grade').item.json.studentID + '

Exam: ' + $('Calculate Total and Grade').item.json.examName + '

Total Marks: ' + $('Calculate Total and Grade').item.json.totalMarks + '/300

Percentage: ' + $('Calculate Total and Grade').item.json.percentage + '%

Grade: ' + $('Calculate Total and Grade').item.json.grade + '

' }}

nodes.name: Google Gemini Chat Model1
nodes.notes:
Analyze the student’s last 7 days progress.

Respond STRICTLY in this format:

STATUS: 
TREND:
ACTION:
RISK LEVEL:

Do not add anything else.
